src:
侍が台湾破り３連勝、Ｂ組１位で２次Ｒ進出…プレミア１２

07 Nov 2019, 14:59



３回２死１塁、鈴木が２ランを放つ（７日で）＝中嶋基樹撮影













６回１死１塁、丸が適時２塁打を放つ（７日）＝中嶋基樹撮影



３回を無失点に抑えた今永（７日）＝中嶋基樹撮影

　野球の東京五輪予選を兼ねる国際大会「プレミア１２」（読売新聞社協賛）は７日、台湾・台中で１次ラウンドＢ組の２試合が行われ、日本代表「侍ジャパン」は台湾に８―１で快勝し、３戦全勝として、同組１位での２次ラウンド進出を決めた。２勝１敗の台湾は２位通過となった。ベネズエラはプエルトリコを７―１で破り３位で終えた。ソウルではＣ組の２試合が行われ、大会連覇を狙う韓国はカナダを３―１で退け、２連勝とした。キューバは延長十回タイブレイクの末、豪州に３―２でサヨナラ勝ちして１勝１敗とした。豪州は２連敗。２次ラウンドは１１日からゾゾマリンスタジアムと東京ドームで始まる。
text:
Samurai defeats Taiwan for 3 consecutive wins, B group first place and second R advance ... Premier 12

07 Nov 2019, 14:59



3 times 2 deaths 1 baseball, Suzuki gives 2 runs (in 7th) = photo by Motoki Nakajima













6 times, 1 death, 1 round, Maru hit 2 strikes in a timely manner (7th)



Imaganaga (7th) = 3 times with no goal scored by Nakajima Motoki

The international tournament “Premier 12” (sponsored by the Yomiuri Shimbun), which also serves as a baseball qualifier for the Tokyo Olympics, will be held on the 7th in Taichung, Taiwan. He won the first round and decided to advance to the second round in the first place of the group as all three wins. Taiwan with 2 wins and 1 loss passed 2nd place. Venezuela defeated Puerto Rico 7-1 and finished third. In Seoul, two matches of Group C were held, and South Korea, aiming for the championship in the tournament, rejected Canada 3-1, and won two consecutive wins. After an extended tenth tie-break, Cuba won a good-bye to Australia with a 3-2 victory over 1 win and 1 loss. Australia lost two consecutive losses. The second round will begin on the 11th at the Zozo Marine Stadium and Tokyo Dome.
